src:
Klopp Akui Divock Origi Sebagai Legenda Liverpool
05 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Liverpool Jurgen Klopp menyebut Divock Origi sebagai legenda The Reds jelang duel melawan Genk di Liga Champions.
Origi bukanlah penyerang utama Liverpool. Ia cuma jadi pemain pelapis bagi Sadio Mane, Mohamed Salah dan Roberto Firmino.
Namun namanya menjadi sangat populer di mata fans Liverpool sejak musim lalu. Pasalnya ia kerap mencetak gol-gol krusial di laga-laga penting.
Golnya kerap menghadirkan kemenangan bagi Liverpool. Sebut saja golnya kala melawan Everton di derby Merseyside pada menit 90+6. Saat itu ia masuk sebagai pemain pengganti.
Yang paling fenomenal dan bakal diingat selamanya oleh fans Liverpool mungkin adalah aksi pemain Belgia itu saat melawan Barcelona di semifinal Liga Champions.
Saat itu ia mencetak dua gol di leg kedua semifinal di Anfield. Ia pun mengantarkan Liverpool menang 4-0 dan membantu timnya melaju ke final.
Di partai puncak melawan Tottenham, Origi juga mencetak satu gol. Ia pun membawa Liverpool menang 2-0 atas Spurs di Wanda Metropolitano.
text:
Klopp recognizes Divock Origi as a Liverpool legend
05 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp calls Divock Origi a legend for the Reds ahead of the duel against Genk in the Champions League.
Origi is not Liverpool's main striker. He just became a coating player for Sadio Mane, Mohamed Salah and Roberto Firmino.
But his name has become very popular with Liverpool fans since last season. The reason he often scored crucial goals in important matches.
His goal often presents victory for Liverpool. Call it his goal when against Everton in the Merseyside derby on 90 + 6 minutes. At that time he entered as a substitute.
The most phenomenal and will be remembered forever by Liverpool fans is probably the action of the Belgian player against Barcelona in the Champions League semifinals.
At that time he scored two goals in the semi-final second leg at Anfield. He also led Liverpool to win 4-0 and help his team advance to the final.
At the top of the party against Tottenham, Origi also scored one goal. He also led Liverpool to a 2-0 win over Spurs at Wanda Metropolitano.
